document.full_text: the departure of renault's  number two executive over a spying-turned-fraud debacle heaps pressure on chief executive carlos ghosn when the carmaker is trying to win investor support for its growth plans.
document.title: renault ceo under pressure as lieutenant quits
lines_and_colors: the departure of renault's  number two executive over a spying-turned-fraud debacle heaps pressure on chief executive carlos ghosn when the carmaker is trying to win investor support for its growth plans.
